body: How To Piss Off Dems Republicans Go Green   Join The LeechesTax  US Dollar Boycott   This World Depression Is An Old Game We Are Telling Wall Street  Our Government To Get Lost Obamas form of Democracy or Communism has only meant that overall less people have money Transferring more wealth to Rothchilds Bilderburg Group The Federal Reserve Bank does nothing for our nations economic problem is ultimately self defeating and extremely ignorant Anyone with a basic knowledge of Socialism Communism or Obamas Economic Fascism knows it only means transferring wealth to a very corrupt few Being oblivious to the Bilderburgs like Obama profiteering on bank bailouts the student loan Fannie Mae bailout corporate bankruptcies  energy price manipulation benefiting the Bilderburg Groups Clean Energy Chinese factories Is a sad example of our peoples desperation lack of education and short sightedness People Wake Up and open your history books to World War II This World Depression is an old game and you will ultimately lose If you want to win dont pay taxes close your bank account barter trade work under the table labor trade use a different form of currency  Bank start a neighborhood watch set up local vendors buying  selling US made tax free goods home school set up tax free alternative housing grow your own food start live stock  crop exchange programs use every social aid program you can and damage public property most importantly enforcement vehicles Admire Leadership not a color and angry empty words on Rothchilds  Reuters News Media or we are doomed to repeat a bad part of history   An Easy Way To Stop Enabling Our Arrogant Corrupt Government And Get Rid Of The Thieves Like Obama That Are In Office To Fill Their Pockets Is Just Say No   Actually it does and has worked for over 50 years for illegals All i did is basically use what Obama promotes and works for illegals to drain the United States resources just like Obama wants too Then when the system crashes everyone will see through Obama or our Check Writer  Chefs thievery manipulation bureaucracy and broken third world socialism ideas Its known as using someones effort and energy against them to crush them People will see soon that there is no difference between Obama and Marie Antoinette and Obama will end the same way All Obama has to do is continue to be himself  People Are Now Responding In Big Numbers  Tax  US Dollar Boycott   People are responding in big numbers now I am in LA area which is very notorious for cynical rude and selfish people All I did is walk around my block hand out fliers and hand out fruit from the first tree harvested Now we have 30 people bartering trading fresh brook trout for authentic tamales garden mulch for clothing or baby things Now its expanding fast with church people horse people mechanics and contractors It only takes labor or things to trade a smile and getting to know your neighbors like people did long ago You will see allot of your neighbors will feel the same way the ones that dont will in time Note War gardens trade with local farmers markets and trade exchanges for gas rations or food stamps were very popular in WWII As far as the currency the states formed their own currency separately that is why you still see state names printed on coins Starting out with printed markers in trade for goods in dollar values works as well Also setting up American made goods  vendors is as easy as good old fashion Church Socials and  Swap Meets or Yard Sales Neighborhood trade exchange pin up boards or news letters work as well  Have A Good Day  John Adams  HELP TEXAS SECEDE  Peacefully grant the State of Texas to withdraw from the United States of America and create its own NEW government   httpspetitionswhitehousegovpetitionpeacefullygrantstatetexaswithdrawunitedstatesamericaandcreateitsownnewgovernmentBmdWCP8B
